home.title: File Tasks, Done.
home.subtitle: Image compression, conversion, PDF tools ‚Äî free, fast, and secure
home.seoText: TookTak provides free online tools including image compression, format conversion, resizing, and PDF editing. All files are processed directly in your browser and never uploaded to a server.

compress.title: Image Compression
compress.subtitle: Reduce JPG, PNG, WEBP file sizes. 100% browser-based.
compress.upload: Drag & drop images or click to select
compress.uploadHint: JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, TIFF, HEIC ¬∑ Max 10MB ¬∑ Up to 10 files
compress.faq1q: Are images uploaded to a server?
compress.faq1a: No. All compression is done 100% in your browser. Files are never sent to a server.
compress.faq2a: JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, TIFF, and HEIC (iPhone photos) are supported.
compress.faq3a: At the default setting (70%), the quality loss is barely noticeable. You can adjust the quality slider.

convert.title: Image Conversion
convert.subtitle: Convert image formats freely. HEIC and TIFF supported!
convert.faq1a: Yes! Convert iPhone HEIC photos to JPG, PNG, WEBP and more.
convert.faq2a: JPG and WEBP conversions use 92% quality, which is barely noticeable.
convert.faq3a: Input: JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, TIFF, HEIC. Output: JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, AVIF.

resize.title: Image Resize
resize.subtitle: Resize images to any dimension. Presets available!
resize.faq1a: Downsizing has minimal quality loss. Upsizing may cause some blurriness.
resize.faq2q: Can I maintain the aspect ratio?
resize.faq2a: Yes! The ratio lock is enabled by default. Just enter width and height auto-calculates.
resize.faq3a: Yes, presets for Instagram, YouTube, Twitter and more are provided.
resize.upload: Drag & drop images or click to select
resize.uploadHint: JPG, PNG, WEBP, GIF, BMP, AVIF, TIFF, HEIC ¬∑ Max 10MB ¬∑ Up to 10 files
resize.errorValidSize: Please enter a valid width and height.

footer.coupangDisclosure: This post is part of Coupang Partners' activities, and we may receive a commission.

common.upload: Drag & drop images or click to select

pdfMerge.title: Merge PDF
pdfMerge.subtitle: Combine multiple PDF files into one. Reorder freely!
pdfMerge.upload: Drag & drop PDF files or click to select
pdfMerge.faq1q: Are PDF files uploaded to a server?
pdfMerge.faq1a: No. All PDF processing is done in your browser. Files are never sent to a server.
pdfMerge.faq2q: Is there a limit on the number of PDFs?
pdfMerge.faq2a: You can merge up to 20 PDF files at once, each up to 20MB.
pdfMerge.faq3q: Can I change the merge order?
pdfMerge.faq3a: Yes! Drag files in the list to reorder them.

pdfSplit.title: Split PDF
pdfSplit.subtitle: Extract specific pages from a PDF.
pdfSplit.upload: Drag & drop a PDF file or click to select
pdfSplit.faq1a: Yes! Click pages or enter ranges (e.g. 1,3,5-8) to select.
pdfSplit.faq2a: No. Original PDF quality is preserved.
pdfSplit.faq3a: Yes! Download as a combined PDF or individual pages.

pdfCompress.title: Compress PDF
pdfCompress.subtitle: Reduce PDF file size while maintaining document quality.
pdfCompress.upload: Drag & drop PDF files or click to select
pdfCompress.lowDesc: Maximum compression. Image quality may decrease slightly.
pdfCompress.mediumDesc: Balance between size and quality. Recommended for most cases.
pdfCompress.highDesc: Maintains best quality. Size reduction may be smaller.
pdfCompress.faq1a: It optimizes images inside the PDF and removes unnecessary metadata. Text is not affected.
pdfCompress.faq2a: No. Text, links, and bookmarks are preserved. Only images are optimized.
pdfCompress.faq3a: Image-heavy PDFs: 30-70% reduction. Text-heavy PDFs: 5-15% reduction typically.

qrCode.title: QR Code Generator
qrCode.subtitle: Create QR codes from URLs, text, contacts and more.
qrCode.inputPlaceholder: Enter URL, text, phone number, etc.
qrCode.faq1q: What can I put in a QR code?
qrCode.faq1a: URLs, text, phone numbers, email addresses, Wi-Fi info and more.
qrCode.faq2a: No. Downloaded QR codes work permanently. However, if a URL changes, you need to create a new QR code.
qrCode.faq3q: Can I change QR code colors?
qrCode.faq3a: Yes! You can customize both QR code and background colors. Note that very light colors may be hard to scan.

removeBg.title: AI Background Removal
removeBg.subtitle: AI automatically removes photo backgrounds. 100% browser-based.
removeBg.upload: Drag & drop image or click to select
removeBg.removingDetail: First run may take 1-2 minutes to download the AI model.
removeBg.faq1q: Are images uploaded to a server?
removeBg.faq1a: No. The AI model runs entirely in your browser. Images never leave your device.
removeBg.faq2a: First run: 1-2 min for model download. After that: 5-15 seconds per image.
removeBg.faq3a: Photos of people, products, and animals with clear foreground-background separation work best.

upscale.title: AI Image Upscale
upscale.subtitle: Enhance low-resolution images with AI upscaling.
upscale.upload: Drag & drop image or click to select
upscale.uploadHint: JPG, PNG, WEBP ¬∑ Max 5MB ¬∑ 1 file ¬∑ Max 1024px recommended
upscale.upscalingDetail: May take 10-60 seconds depending on image size.
upscale.faq1a: Uses advanced Canvas interpolation (bicubic) to upscale and sharpen images.
upscale.faq2a: 2x, 3x, and 4x upscaling supported. Results depend on original quality.
upscale.faq3a: Usually 5-30 seconds depending on image size.
